website_summaries.verdict: Pricier than some other sets, but these poles are extremely sturdy and meet all standards.
pros: You can stake these poles into the ground when used outdoors or attach them to a metal base for indoor training
Each pole is 3.25 feet in height and consists of a thick plastic for aggressive training sessions
The base is sturdier than others, keeping the poles in place
cons: Only has six poles in the set, so it may not meet all training needs

customer_reviews.title: If you order set of 12 you get 2 sets of 6 that do not connect
customer_reviews.text: Misrepresented as set of 12. You receive 2 sets of 6 that do not connect. After contacting the company, they answered by saying that they are made into set of 12 by spacing the 2 set the correct distance apart. If you are only interested in a set of 6 that are satisfactory for competition training
customer_reviews.author: UG

customer_reviews.title: This product is so worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when these arrived. They are so much nicer than I expected them to be. Thank you to Lord Anson for making a strong sturdy product for those of us on a tight budget and keeping the price down so that we can afford to buy them. I was also surprised and very pleased to know that the base is metal and not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: J Ander

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to buy if you’re comparing!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and SO easy (2min) to put together. Will be using to practice with 4 poles in the house as this is a beginner dog - comes with 6 poles and stakes to set poles outside a little more permanently. Easy to carry bag. Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MommaRahja

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: I'm super happy with the quality of these poles! I ordered 12 and the company accidentally send me just 6, but as soon as I spoke to them, they sent me the other 6, so they fixed their error. The bottons are heavy duty coated metal too, so less likely to rust!
customer_reviews.author: RyanMT

customer_reviews.title: Quality of construction
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the construction of the weave poles. Good value for the price. I like that I can fold them rather compactly and carry them upright in my van, making them easy to set up in my temporary training area
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: User friendly & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Simple to put together and take apart. The base moves easily for widening the poles for training purposes. Stable and doesn’t fall over or move when my GSD bumps into them. Heavy enough to be sturdy, but light enough to take with me. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: picky husband approved
customer_reviews.text: We needed new weave poles but my husband did not like anything that I could find. I finally found these. The base is metal . Even my picky husband said "great value for the money". I would highly recommend them. Very easy to set up. They are portable but I just put them in my yard to practice with.
customer_reviews.author: suzy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These weave poles are really nice and the price is reasonable when compared to similar more expensive sets. They are super easy to use and very adjustable for dogs new to weaving. They come with a handy carrying case. I am very pleased with this purchase. And my golden retriever loves his agility training with the poles.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy weave poles are a great training aid.
customer_reviews.text: Set these poles up the day they have arrived, and have left them up since in Pac NW. They are a great training aid for my large dog, and sturdy enough to withstand the occasional miss. Loved the easy set-up, carrying case, and durability. Would buy 6 more of the same if I want to go up to all 12 poles for training.
customer_reviews.author: Freelon F. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great portable weaves!
customer_reviews.text: Good set for travel. Love being able to pack up a full set of poles to train in many locations. Great for building fluency in weave pole performance. Sturdy enough, but If your dog is rough on poles, you will certainly need to stake in the ground . I would not consider using for true competition but so affordable for training! I am recommending to all my students.
customer_reviews.author: kentfam

customer_reviews.title: Well made, portable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I thought the set was well made and fairly sturdy. I liked that the base is made out of metal and not plastic. The poles are sturdy and screw into the base. I also plan to take it to different locations so its portability was important and the carrying bag is a plus. I already own a set of 12 weave poles but I don’t own the channel weaves. I like that I can open up the entry and make it easier if I need to. It’s a good training set for the money.
customer_reviews.author: dog lady

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great quality,  great price
customer_reviews.text: These weave poles are great. Very sturdy, made great, poles are the new darker color with broad stripes. They are better than most weave poles I've seen for 1/2 the price. I will be suggesting them to friends and my weave pole group.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move in my yard
customer_reviews.text: I like that this folds up and that I can change the shape of it as needed for training.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the sturdiness of this product. It is heavy enough to stand on its own, but comes with stakes to secure it. Love the carry case as well, to make transportation easier.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It is great at of weave pole for practice at home. One or was missing cap. They sent replacement sent quickly.
customer_reviews.author: John Buginas

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy set of weave poles, just right for my patio. They were easy to set up and adjust. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: dpmiller

customer_reviews.title: 2 sets of these weave poles are not designed to be 12 weaves
customer_reviews.text: I like them just fine but find it ridiculous that you did not design them to be linked and used as a set of 12
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Geraldi

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a dog park and it is sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Malecki

customer_reviews.title: Very portable and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I found these to be perfect for training. they are very portable and easy to use inside or outside.
customer_reviews.author: C Green

customer_reviews.title: Love these weaves!
customer_reviews.text: Great construction. Not flimsy plastic on bottom. Love them. Great that they come with a carry case also.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Great for training!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, holds up well against speedy dogs with lots of force. Easy to set up and fold. Carrying bag is awesome too.
customer_reviews.author: T-Powers

customer_reviews.title: Professional Grade
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set, well worth the cost, very sturdy professional grade
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, just gace to figure out how to train them to go through it!
customer_reviews.author: descendant of the signers

customer_reviews.title: Great weave poles
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, sturdy and solid material. Best weave poles we’ve owned to date!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy,  practice set of weaves.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely fast shipping. Very sturdy set of 6 weave poles. I have the set of 12 red and white ones from another company and these are as good - if not better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We train agility professionally
customer_reviews.text: These are the best we have ever ordered! They can be used inside or outside. They are sturdy and easy and portable. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Bowlin

customer_reviews.title: System easy to transport and put together!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very intelligent dog who needs to keep learning new things. The agility weave poles allow me to continue working with him physically and mentally.
customer_reviews.author: Seamless Stress

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up poles. Easy to adjust. Heavy metal base.
customer_reviews.author: rtauer

customer_reviews.title: All weather equipment
customer_reviews.text: These poles are really easy to set up and they stay out in all weather and still look great.
customer_reviews.author: Liv Daly

customer_reviews.title: Well built weave pole set.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the set of 12 was a actually was actually a set of 12 and not 2 sets of 6 that you have to measure between to set up as 12 poles.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These weave poles are great for indoor and outdoor use for practice at home.
customer_reviews.author: Kra5hy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to assemble and are perfect for practicing weave polls at home in my basement.
customer_reviews.author: Pmm

customer_reviews.title: affordable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors, the sturdy base, and the ease of operation. Great for practice!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to set up and break down. It even shipped faster than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: John Andrew Yackel

customer_reviews.title: These are great so far.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a portable option to practice in places other than at home. At home I have a bigger/full set. These are great for a portable option, sturdy base unlike those with a plastic base. Handy carrying case. I bought the set of 6. Once loaded I. The bag totally manageable in that they carry easy, I am as worried they would be too heavy. They do need to be staked in place in some fashion as they are light weight unless you are using them as off sets or with a small dog.
customer_reviews.author: Rainstorm

product_meta.title: Lord Anson™ Dog Agility Weave Poles - Competition Grade Adjustable Agility Weave Pole Set - Dog Agility Equipment Set - Weave Pole Set w/Carrying Case
feature_bullets: LORD ANSON AGILITY WEAVE POLE SET - Each Lord Anson product is designed and tested by a team of experienced dog owners and designers to bring the best experience to both you and your pet. When you choose Lord Anson, your dog will thank you.

ADJUSTABLE AND VERSATILE - The Lord Anson Agility Weave Set comes with 6 heavy duty, regulation size weave poles that can be arranged in a variety of layouts. The high quality, powder coated, blue metal base makes it easy to adjust the layout of the weave poles according to the skill level of your dog. Stakes are included to secure the base to the ground when used on grass or dirt. It's easy to assemble and transport in the included carrying case for dog training and agility on the go.

STURDY AGILITY POLES - Lord Anson competition grade agility poles are 3.25 ft (1 meter) long and made from a thick gauge, high quality plastic. Other thinner, smaller poles in cheaper agility sets will become warped and bent during training. Lord Anson agility poles are built to withstand extensive training and use.

HEAVY DUTY METAL BASE - The adjustable metal base included in this set features regulation spacing (2 ft on center), and metal threads that connect to each agility weave pole inside of a secure rubber and metal housing. Other low quality adjustable weave sets feature a flimsy fiberglass or plastic base with plastic threads that will break during training and create a potential hazard for your dog. With the Agility Weave Pole set, you can train with peace of mind knowing that your dog is safe.

GREAT FOR AGILITY, REHABILITATION, AND OBEDIENCE TRAINING. The Lord Anson Agility Weave Set can be used for much more than just agility. Whether you are training your dog for an upcoming show, having recreational fun with your dog at the park, or rehabilitating an injured dog, the Lord Anson Agility Weave Set delivers quality and performance that you can trust.
